name: Suspicious Plink Remote Forwarding
description: Detects suspicious Plink tunnel remote forarding to a local port
false_positives: Administrative activity using a remote port forwarding to a local port
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.pe.description:Command\-line\ SSH,\ Telnet,\ and\ Rlogin\ client AND process.command_line:*\ \-R\ *)`
